CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show personal info on profile
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Your personal info is visible for anyone to view.
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Your personal info is not visible for everyone.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Share game activity
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Your game events and activity will be posted to your Battle feed.
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Your game events and activity will NOT be posted to your Battle feed.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Allow friend requests
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Other players will be able to send you friend requests.
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Other players will be unable to send you friend requests.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Mute chat notification
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: You will be notified of new chat messages.
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: You will not be notified of new chat messages.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Mute event notification
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: You will be notified of new events.
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: You will not be notified of new events.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Mute battle report notification
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: You will be notified of new Battle reports.
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: You will not be notified of new Battle reports.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Mute friend request notification
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: You will be notified of new friend requests.
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: You will not be notified of new friend requests.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Mute game notification
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: You will be notified when the game is ready.
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: You will not be notified when the game is ready.
